00041 #define OCTEON_CORE_MALLOC(size)    cvmx_bootmem_alloc(size,8)
00042 #define OCTEON_CORE_FREE(free)      do{}while(0)

00044 #define KILOBYTE            1024
00045

00048 /* 
00049  * WARNING: These are allocated per core.
00050  * Change in MAX_SW_FPA_POOLS should be edited accordingly in sw_fpa_pools defined in memconfig.h 
00051  */
00052 #define MAX_SW_FPA_POOLS    8

00056 #define SW_FPA_POOL2_SIZE   (2*KILOBYTE)

00058 #define SW_FPA_POOL4_SIZE   (8*KILOBYTE)
